profileIncomplete.description: For accurate resume parsing and better vacancy matching, please complete your profile with your basic information and language preferences.

summary.title: Summary
summary.placeholder: A brief professional summary highlighting your key qualifications and career objectives...
summary.hint: Optional. A 2-3 sentence overview of your professional background.

experience.empty: No experience entries. Add your work history.
experience.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief overview of your role and responsibilities...

education.empty: No education entries. Add your educational background.

skills.title: Skills
skills.hint: At least one skill group is required. Group skills by category (e.g., Languages, Frameworks, Tools).

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.empty: No certifications. Add your professional certifications.

customSections.title: Additional Sections
customSections.empty: No additional sections. Add custom sections like Open Source, Publications, Awards.
customSections.hint: Add custom sections for Open Source contributions, Publications, Awards, etc.

settings.platformOnlyNotice: LLM execution is platform-managed. Personal API keys are no longer supported.

form.urlHint: Optional. Link to the job posting.
form.notesPlaceholder: Add any personal notes about this vacancy...
form.notesHint: Optional. Private notes for your reference.

detail.title: Vacancy Details
detail.generateHint: Generate a tailored resume optimized for this vacancy. The AI will analyze the job description and emphasize your most relevant skills and experience.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this vacancy?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. All associated tailored resumes will also be deleted.

resume.generateFirst: Generate a tailored resume from the overview page first.

preparation.title: Preparation Details
preparation.disabledDescription: Detailed scoring is currently disabled for your role.
preparation.noGenerationDescription: Generate a tailored resume first to unlock preparation insights.
preparation.noDetailsDescription: Open the resume page and run detailed scoring to view preparation insights.

error.invalidData: Please check your input and try again

footer.tagline: Tailor your resume for every opportunity

hero.title: Turn one resume into role-ready applications in minutes.
hero.subtitle: ApplyKit adapts your resume to each vacancy, keeps facts grounded, and exports both ATS-safe and human-polished versions from one source.
hero.previewAtsLine1: Optimized for parser readability and structured keyword coverage.
hero.previewAtsLine2: Role-specific achievements sorted by impact and relevance.
hero.previewAtsLine3: Clean sections and consistent terminology for screening systems.
hero.previewHumanLine1: Natural language tuned for recruiter and hiring manager review.
hero.previewHumanLine2: Stronger narrative arc, concise impact bullets, better readability.
hero.previewHumanLine3: Keeps factual integrity while improving clarity and positioning.

proof.label: Positioning
proof.title: Built for serious job search velocity, not generic text generation.
proof.subtitle: The workflow is tuned for repeatable applications: keep your baseline resume, adapt per vacancy, track quality, and export instantly.
proof.rolesNote: Marketing, operations, finance, sales, HR, customer success, and other office roles can use the same adaptation flow.

flow.label: Workflow
flow.title: A focused flow from baseline resume to targeted application.
flow.subtitle: No noisy dashboard maze. Each step is explicit, fast, and designed to reduce decision fatigue.

upload.title: Import baseline resume
upload.description: Upload DOCX/PDF once and keep a reliable base profile in structured form.

target.title: Attach vacancy context
target.description: Paste the job description and key context so adaptation stays role-specific.

adapt.title: Generate and review
adapt.description: Create tailored content, inspect score shifts, and regenerate only when needed.

export.title: Export and apply
export.description: Download ATS or Human PDF instantly and move to application submission.

features.label: What You Get
features.title: Everything you need to apply faster with better results.
features.subtitle: Spend less time rewriting and more time applying to the roles that matter.

parse.title: Start from your existing resume
parse.description: Upload once and reuse your profile for every vacancy.

rewrite.title: Tailored to each vacancy
rewrite.description: Your experience is reframed to match each role while staying truthful.

score.title: Know when it is ready
score.description: See before/after fit so you can apply confidently.

versions.title: Keep every version
versions.description: Compare drafts and improvements without losing your previous work.

formats.title: Export for every channel
formats.description: Get ATS and recruiter-friendly versions from the same content.

limits.title: Stay in control
limits.description: Work with clear limits and a predictable flow, without surprises.

dual.label: Output Strategy
dual.title: Two resume outputs. One consistent source of truth.
dual.subtitle: Keep your content aligned while changing the presentation based on where you send your application.

ats.title: ATS Resume
ats.point1: Simple structure for parser compatibility and keyword traceability.
ats.point2: Minimal visual noise and predictable section hierarchy.
ats.point3: Best when application forms auto-parse uploaded files.

human.title: Human Resume
human.point1: Clear typography and hierarchy for recruiter readability.
human.point2: Balanced narrative style with concise, impact-focused bullets.
human.point3: Best for direct outreach, referrals, and PDF-first review.

dual.singleSourceTitle: Content is shared. Only presentation differs by channel.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Questions job seekers ask most often.
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to help you move faster with confidence.
faq.callout: Start with one vacancy, compare your before/after result, and iterate only if needed.

data.question: Will it rewrite my resume from scratch?
data.answer: No. It adapts your existing resume to the vacancy, keeps your core facts, and helps you present them better.

industries.question: Is this only for software engineers?
industries.answer: No. It works for office roles across product, marketing, sales, operations, finance, HR, and more.

model.question: How long does one tailored version take?
model.answer: Usually a few minutes. You can quickly review the result, make edits, and regenerate if needed.

output.question: Why are there ATS and Human versions?
output.answer: Because application systems and people read resumes differently. You get both formats from the same content.

offerPeek.line1: We'd be excited to welcome you to the team and build meaningful outcomes together.
offerPeek.line2: Your profile aligns with our goals, and we believe you'll make a strong impact.

floatingPaper.summaryLine1: Product-focused profile tailored for leadership, execution, and cross-functional collaboration.
floatingPaper.summaryLine2: Experience framed around measurable impact, clear responsibilities, and role-specific language.
floatingPaper.summaryLine3: Optimized structure for both ATS parsing and recruiter readability.

cta.label: Launch Faster
cta.title: Ship higher-quality applications with less manual rewriting.
cta.subtitle: Use one controlled workflow for adaptation, scoring, and export. Start small, then scale with role-based model routing.

footer.description: ApplyKit is a focused resume adaptation workspace for individuals and teams who need quality, speed, and repeatability.
footer.tagline: Built for fast, high-quality application cycles.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: Complete your profile to enable resume generation
